mentions.context: All the imputations were performed with the Beagle version 4.0 software [20], which can integrate genomic and pedigree information for imputation.
The regression coefficients and their variance were obtained by solving mixed model equations with the DMU software [23].
These analyses were carried out using the restricted maximum likelihood (REML) algorithm in the software DMU [23].
Estimation of the variance components generated by REML and predictions were carried out with the software DMU [23].
